Leonard has written many well known books, with several made into film/tv:
Gold Coast, The Big Bounce, Bandits, Fifty-two Pickup, Killshot, Get Shorty, 
Out of Sight, Be Cool, 3:10 to Yuma, etc.

Original CD tracks, labed by CD, track and chapter

Thanks for sharing & caring.

  From Recorded Books:
From the king of crime fiction comes a hip, funny, and fiercely suspenseful roller coaster ride of a thriller. Robin and Skip are lovers from the 60s who burned bras and draft cards, dropped acid, and finally dynamited a federal building.
